A

addAssignment() - Method in class Assignment
This method takes user input for assignment and adds an assignment to the assignment table (mySQL) Calls Queries.printList("courses"), Queries.InsertIntoDatabase(), Queries.createTasksFromAssignments
addClass() - Method in class Course
Takes user input to add a class into the DB Calls Queries.insertClasstoDatabase()
addCourse() - Method in class Course
Takes user input to add a course into DB Only asks for semesterID if static semesterID is not set.
addSemester() - Method in class Semester
Adds a semester to DB Calls Queries.insertIntoDatabase()
addTask() - Method in class Task
Takes user input to add a task into DB.
addTask(String, String, int) - Method in class Queries
adds a new task to tasks table with a deadline (used to let program choose where to put it in schedule)
addTask(String, String, int, String, int) - Method in class Queries
Adds a new task to tasks table with a chosen time
